# sort-colors-js

Sort an array of hex colors by HUE

### Install

    npm install sort-colors-js
    
### Usage    

```js
import sortColorsByHue from 'sort-colors-js'

const arrayColorsSorted = sortColorsByHue([
            '#e6194b',
            '#3cb44b',
            '#ffe119',
            '#4363d8',
            '#f58231',
            '#911eb4'
            ])
```


![colors sorted](https://i.stack.imgur.com/uhDfW.jpg)
